definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技術面，短期及中期各項技術指標保持多頭強勢狀態。

sentences.english: The powerful anti - Huguenot Holy League was formed in 1576.
sentences.chinese: 1576年，強勢的反胡格諾派組織神聖聯盟成立。

sentences.english: Rental-market strength is also rousing a long-dormant building industry.
sentences.chinese: 租房市場的強勢還喚醒了處於長期昏睡狀態的建造業。

sentences.english: How aggressive are the Chinese tax authorities?
These days, she said, powerful businesspeople lack the wisdom of age.
sentences.chinese: 李女士說，“現在強勢的商人缺乏智慧的年齡。

sentences.english: But their strong positions may well yield rich profits in the future.
sentences.chinese: 但他們的強勢地位很可能在未來產生豐厚利潤。

sentences.english: By the '40s and '50s, it was incredibly powerful.
sentences.chinese: 它直到四五十年代都還十分強勢。

sentences.english: We’re starting this drawdown from a position of strength.
sentences.chinese: 我們是從強勢地位開始這次撤軍的。

sentences.english: In some places swimmers may encounter strong undertows or ocean currents.
sentences.chinese: 在一些地方游泳者可能遇到強勢的暗流或者洋流。

sentences.english: To endure them is the price of being a powerful and big government.
sentences.chinese: 容忍這些東西是作爲一個強勢大政府需要付出的代價。

sentences.english: The lower the ratio, the stronger that silver prices become in comparison to gold.
sentences.chinese: 這個比例越低，銀價就比金價更強勢。

sentences.english: These cases offer experiences and lessons for building a native strong catering brand of Tongren.
sentences.chinese: 爲建設銅仁本土強勢餐飲品牌提供正反經驗借鑑。

sentences.english: Nor is a strongman or tightly knit group of leaders likely to be able to overcome them.
sentences.chinese: 強勢的領導或緊密團結的政黨都不能“戰勝”他們。

sentences.english: Inevitability and temperament are two hallmarks of Gates the innovator.
sentences.chinese: 強勢和急躁是蓋茨作爲革新者的兩個商標。

sentences.english: The stock was also upgraded to “conviction buy” from “buy” at Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 高盛集團也把西門子股票評級從買入上調爲強勢買入。

sentences.english: Biotech stocks are really on fire today.
sentences.chinese: 生物科技類股今天表現非常強勢。

definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
